channel.title: Groups on SiriDB documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Groups on SiriDB documentation

item.title: create group
item.description: Groups should be between backticks to make them different from strings. Since a group is basically a cached regular expression we need to provide the regular expression we want to use for the group. Syntax create group `groupname` for /regular_expression/ Example # Create a group linux create group `linux` for /linux.*/

item.title: count groups
drop groups
item.description: Drops an existing group. Syntax drop group `groupname` Example # Drop group `linux` drop group `linux`
